fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Select an image to use as background the image hotspot question.

fields.label: Hotspots
fields.description: Choose appropriate figure for your hotspot, configure it, then drag and resize it into place.

fields.label: Hotspot Name
fields.description: Please enter what the user is trying to find i.e. risks, objects, errors (this will be used in feedback statements).

fields.label: Number of correct hotspots that need to be found for question completion
fields.description: If left blank, will default to the number of correct hotspots created.

fields.label: Correct
fields.description: There can be multiple correct hotspots. The user gets correct/incorrect feedback immediately after each click. The feedback will be displayed in the form of - (Text entered below) (Number of hotspots found) of (Correct hotspots needed) (Hotspot Name entered above).

fields.label: Feedback if the user selects an empty spot:
fields.placeholder: You didn't locate any hotspots, try again!

fields.label: Feedback if the user selects an already found hotspot:
fields.placeholder: You have already found this one!
